communityPlugins.name: fastify-piscina
communityPlugins.description: A worker   thread pool plugin using [Piscina](https://github.com/piscinajs/piscina).

communityPlugins.name: fastify-polyglot
communityPlugins.description: A plugin to   handle i18n using   [node-polyglot](https://www.npmjs.com/package/node-polyglot).

communityPlugins.name: fastify-postgraphile
communityPlugins.description: Plugin to integrate [PostGraphile](https://www.graphile.org/postgraphile/) in   a Fastify project.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-prettier
communityPlugins.description: A Fastify   plugin that uses [prettier](https://github.com/prettier/prettier) under the   hood to beautify outgoing responses and/or other things in the Fastify server.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-print-routes
communityPlugins.description: A Fastify plugin that prints all available routes.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-protobufjs
communityPlugins.description: Fastify and protobufjs, together at last. Uses protobufjs by default.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-qrcode
communityPlugins.description: This plugin   utilizes [qrcode](https://github.com/soldair/node-qrcode) to generate QR Code.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-qs
communityPlugins.description: A plugin for Fastify   that adds support for parsing URL query parameters with   [qs](https://github.com/ljharb/qs).

communityPlugins.name: fastify-racing
communityPlugins.description: Fastify's   plugin that adds support to handle an aborted request asynchronous.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-ravendb
communityPlugins.description: RavenDB   connection plugin. It exposes the same `DocumentStore` (or multiple ones)   across the whole Fastify application.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-raw-body
communityPlugins.description: Add the   `request.rawBody` field.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-rbac
communityPlugins.description: Fastify role-based   access control plugin.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-recaptcha
communityPlugins.description: Fastify plugin for recaptcha verification.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-redis-channels
communityPlugins.description: A plugin for fast, reliable, and scalable channels implementation based on   Redis streams.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-register-routes
communityPlugins.description: Plugin to automatically load routes from a specified path and optionally limit   loaded file names by a regular expression.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-response-caching
communityPlugins.description: A Fastify plugin for caching the response.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-response-time
communityPlugins.description: Add   `X-Response-Time` header at each request for Fastify, in milliseconds.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-resty
communityPlugins.description: Fastify-based   web framework with REST API routes auto-generation for TypeORM entities using   DI and decorators.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-reverse-routes
communityPlugins.description: Fastify reverse routes plugin, allows to defined named routes and build path   using name and parameters.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-rob-config
communityPlugins.description: Fastify Rob-Config integration.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-route-group
communityPlugins.description: Convenient grouping and inheritance of routes.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-s3-buckets
communityPlugins.description: Ensure the existence of defined S3 buckets on the application startup.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-schema-constraint
communityPlugins.description: Choose the JSON schema to use based on request parameters.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-schema-to-typescript
communityPlugins.description: Generate typescript types based on your JSON/YAML validation schemas so they   are always in sync.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-sentry
communityPlugins.description: Fastify plugin   to add the Sentry SDK error handler to requests.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-sequelize
communityPlugins.description: Fastify   plugin work with Sequelize (adapter for NodeJS -> Sqlite, Mysql, Mssql,   Postgres).

communityPlugins.name: fastify-server-session
communityPlugins.description: A session plugin with support for arbitrary backing caches via   `fastify-caching`.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-slonik
communityPlugins.description: Fastify Slonik   plugin, with this you can use slonik in every part of your server.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-slow-down
communityPlugins.description: A plugin    to delay the response from the server.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-socket.io
communityPlugins.description: a   Socket.io plugin for Fastify.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-split-validator
communityPlugins.description: Small plugin to allow you use multiple validators in one route based on each   HTTP part of the request.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-sqlite
communityPlugins.description: connects your   application to a sqlite3 database.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-sse
communityPlugins.description: to provide Server-Sent   Events with `reply.sse(  )` to Fastify.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-sse-v2
communityPlugins.description: to provide   Server-Sent Events using Async Iterators (supports newer versions of Fastify).

communityPlugins.name: fastify-ssr-vite
communityPlugins.description: A simple   plugin for setting up server side rendering with vite.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-stripe
communityPlugins.description: Plugin to   initialize and encapsulate [Stripe   Node.js](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-node) instances in Fastify.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-supabase
communityPlugins.description: Plugin to   initialize and encapsulate [Supabase](https://github.com/supabase/supabase-js)   instances in Fastify.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-tls-keygen
communityPlugins.description: Automatically generate a browser-compatible, trusted, self-signed,   localhost-only, TLS certificate.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-tokenize
communityPlugins.description: [Tokenize](https://github.com/Bowser65/Tokenize) plugin for Fastify that   removes the pain of managing authentication tokens, with built-in integration   for `fastify-auth`.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-totp
communityPlugins.description: A plugin to handle   TOTP (e.g. for 2FA).

communityPlugins.name: fastify-twitch-ebs-tools
communityPlugins.description: Useful functions for Twitch Extension Backend Services (EBS).

communityPlugins.name: fastify-type-provider-zod
communityPlugins.description: Fastify   [type provider](https://www.fastify.io/docs/latest/Reference/Type-Providers/)   for [zod](https://github.com/colinhacks/zod).

communityPlugins.name: fastify-typeorm-plugin
communityPlugins.description: Fastify plugin to work with TypeORM.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-user-agent
communityPlugins.description: parses your   request's `user-agent` header.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-vhost
communityPlugins.description: Proxy   subdomain HTTP requests to another server (useful if you want to point   multiple subdomains to the same IP address, while running different servers on   the same machine).

communityPlugins.name: fastify-vite
communityPlugins.description: [Vite](https://vitejs.dev/) plugin for Fastify with SSR data support.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-vue-plugin
communityPlugins.description: [Nuxt.js](https://nuxtjs.org) plugin for Fastify. Control the routes nuxt   should use.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-wamp-router
communityPlugins.description: Web   Application Messaging Protocol router for Fastify.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-webpack-hmr
communityPlugins.description: Webpack hot module reloading plugin for Fastify.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-webpack-hot
communityPlugins.description: Webpack   Hot Module Replacement for Fastify.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-ws
communityPlugins.description: WebSocket integration for   Fastify with support for WebSocket lifecycle hooks instead of a single   handler function. Built upon [ws](https://github.com/websockets/ws) and   [uws](https://github.com/uNetworking/uWebSockets).

communityPlugins.name: fastify-xml-body-parser
communityPlugins.description: Parse XML payload / request body into JS / JSON object.

communityPlugins.name: fastify-xray
communityPlugins.description: Fastify plugin   for AWS XRay recording.

communityPlugins.name: i18next-http-middleware
communityPlugins.description: An [i18next](https://www.i18next.com) based i18n (internationalization)   middleware to be used with Node.js web frameworks like Express or Fastify and   also for Deno.

communityPlugins.name: k-fastify-gateway
communityPlugins.description: API   Gateway plugin for Fastify, a low footprint implementation that uses the   `fastify-reply-from` HTTP proxy library.

communityPlugins.name: mercurius
communityPlugins.description: A fully-featured and performant GraphQL   server implementation for Fastify.

communityPlugins.name: nstats
communityPlugins.description: A fast and compact way to get   all your network and process stats for your node application. Websocket,   HTTP/S, and prometheus compatible!

communityPlugins.name: oas-fastify
communityPlugins.description: OAS 3.x to   Fastify routes automation. Automatically generates route handlers with fastify   configuration and validation.

communityPlugins.name: openapi-validator-middleware
communityPlugins.description: Swagger and OpenAPI 3.0 spec-based request validation middleware that supports   Fastify.

communityPlugins.name: pubsub-http-handler
communityPlugins.description: A Fastify   plugin to easily create Google Cloud PubSub endpoints.

communityPlugins.name: sequelize-fastify
communityPlugins.description: A simple   and lightweight Sequelize plugin for Fastify.

communityPlugins.name: typeorm-fastify-plugin
communityPlugins.description: A simple   and updated Typeorm plugin for use with Fastify. #### [Community Tools](#community-tools)

communityPlugins.name: @fastify-userland/workflows
communityPlugins.description: Reusable workflows for use in the Fastify plugin

communityPlugins.name: fast-maker
communityPlugins.description: route configuration   generator by directory structure.

communityPlugins.name: simple-tjscli
communityPlugins.description: CLI tool to   generate JSON Schema from TypeScript interfaces.
